articles.title: Inflation in Turkey jumps to 59% - Euronews
articles.description: Inflation reached 58.9% year-on-year in August in the country, the highest since December 2022, according to official data published on Monday.
articles.content:
Inflation reached 58.9% year-on-year in August in the country, the highest since December 2022, according to official data published on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese lenders extend billions of dollars to Russian banks after western sanctions - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing has pushed renminbi as alternative global currency to dollar
articles.content:
